title: Chargeback Win Kit — Visa 10.4 (Fraud)
prompt: Draft a Visa 10.4 representment for {{order_id}} {{amount}} {{order_date}}. Map evidence to reason code 10.4 criteria. Include: 3-D Secure data, AVS/CVV, IP/device, delivery proof, prior comms. Close with issuer guidance.

title: Chargeback Win Kit — Mastercard 4853 (Cardholder Dispute)
prompt: Draft a Mastercard 4853 representment for {{order_id}} {{amount}} {{order_date}}. Map evidence to 4853 documentation list. Include: identity/auth evidence, usage logs, delivery, support thread, refund policy, terms consent.

title: Chargeback Win Kit — Amex Unauthorized
prompt: Draft an Amex unauthorized-dispute representment for {{order_id}} {{amount}} {{order_date}}. Map evidence to Amex unauthorized checklist. Include: device fingerprint, AVS/CVV match, usage/activity, delivery/proof-of-receipt, KYC, comms.
